name: Dragon Valleys
description:
Dragon Valleys will be a free-to-play, cross-platform, sandbox / crafting MMORPG, and has currently implemented mining, alchemy, smelting, blacksmithing, summoning, as well as some milling and cooking.

The game is a seamless open world and includes safe and PvP areas. Combat is aim-based and the game is top-down 3D. All players have the ability to learn all skills and are not limited to specific classes/weapons. 

In the game's working open alpha state, the features include a basic storyline with single-time quests, as well as repeatable quests, a chat system, partys, guilds, pets, mounts, and more!
